system.description:
Effect: Connection - Sacred Sword. For 3 PP as a Free Action, the next [Sharp] attack used by the user has its target change to Wide Line, its range to 8, and loses [Contact] and [Pass X] until the attack resolves.

Passive: The user deals 30% more damage to creatures that possess Types that are super-effective against any of the user's Types, and the user may use Sacred Sword as a Psychic-Type attack.
